flavor_text_entries.x:
Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel.
Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that
stands in its way.
flavor_text_entries.y:
The way several Bergmite huddle
on its back makes it look like
an aircraft carrier made of ice.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Its ice-covered body is as hard as steel.
Its cumbersome frame crushes anything that
stands in its way.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
The way several Bergmite huddle
on its back makes it look like
an aircraft carrier made of ice.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
At high latitudes, this Pokémon can be found
with clusters of Bergmite on its back as it swims
among the icebergs.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
As Avalugg moves about during the day,
the cracks in its body deepen. The Pokémon’s
body returns to a pristine state overnight.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and
can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep
mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
